page.title: 06OLD RECTORY E.WORLINGTON
page.content: Lady Stevens lives in the old rectory which belonged to East Worlington church.The house is 300 years old.It was built in the 17th century as a rectory and carried on being a rectory until the church sold it in 1958.The Rev.Maddocks lived in the house before Lady Stevens.The rector in the 18th century decided to make the house bigger because he had a big family.Now the house has got 15 rooms.Lady Stevens now owns 4 acres of woodland and 24 acres of land.She keeps her horse in a paddock.She has 3 outbuildings.She has a part time gardener but before the last war they had 3 servants in the house and outside.
